argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | 1arith.1 | |- M = ( n e. NN |-> ( p e. Prime |-> ( p pCnt n ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_pccl | |- ( ( p e. Prime /\ N e. NN ) -> ( p pCnt N ) e. NN0 ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( N e. NN /\ p e. Prime ) -> ( p pCnt N ) e. NN0 ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( p e. Prime |-> ( p pCnt N ) ) = ( p e. Prime |-> ( p pCnt N ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_fmptd | |- ( N e. NN -> ( p e. Prime |-> ( p pCnt N ) ) : Prime --> NN0 ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_1arithlem1 | |- ( N e. NN -> ( M ` N ) = ( p e. Prime |-> ( p pCnt N ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_feq1d | |- ( N e. NN -> ( ( M ` N ) : Prime --> NN0 <-> ( p e. Prime |-> ( p pCnt N ) ) : Prime --> NN0 ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_mpbird | |- ( N e. NN -> ( M ` N ) : Prime --> NN0 ) |
